books.title: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship that teaches how to write clean, readable, and maintainable code.

books.title: You Don't Know JS
books.author: Kyle Simpson
books.description: A deep dive into JavaScript core concepts such as scope, closures, and async behavior.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: A practical guide on building good habits and breaking bad ones through small changes.

books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: Andrew Hunt
books.description: Timeless advice for programmers on problem-solving, career growth, and software development best practices.

books.title: Design Patterns
books.author: Erich Gamma
books.description: An introduction to reusable object-oriented software design patterns.

books.title: Deep Work
books.author: Cal Newport
books.description: Explains how focused work leads to better productivity and meaningful success.

books.title: Introduction to Algorithms
books.author: Thomas H. Cormen
books.description: A comprehensive textbook covering modern algorithm design and analysis.

books.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
books.author: Robert Kiyosaki
books.description: A personal finance book focusing on financial education and mindset.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical novel about following your dreams and listening to your heart.

books.title: Start With Why
books.author: Simon Sinek
books.description: Explores how leaders inspire action by starting with a clear purpose.
